moratuwa wels kumara widuhal kridakayo wasara 10kata pasuwa bambalapitiya santha pithara widuhala parajaya kaleya.anthar pasal krikat tharagawaliye moratuwe pawathi tharagaye di wels kumara widuhala kadulu 7kin jaya gaththeya.wasara 2002di wels kumara widuhala awasan warata santha pithara pila parajaya kara thibuni.santha pithara palamu inima 151lahiru milantha 60, shashin pranandu 33 (thilan nimesh 28/4, jayanga piris 42/2)dewani inima 243dushan hemantha 82, kawinda thisera 46, ranitha liyanarachchi 34, dinith hewathanthri 23, sheshan pranandu 23 (thilan nimesh 98/5, shanuka dulaj 45/3)wels kumara widuhala palamu inima kadulu 7kata 311shanuka dulaj 81, kushal mendis 52, suchira pranandu 43, tharindu dilshan 42, ashan mendis 35, keshan aponsu 25 (dushan hemantha 79/3, shashin pranandu 46/2)dewani inima kadulu 3kata 85 kushal mendis 58.sa.
